mapper.select: select m.id as m_id,m.account_id ,m.password ,m.status,r.id as r_id, r.name as r_name from `MEMBER` m inner join MEMBERROLE mr on m.id =mr.member_id INNER JOIN `ROLE` r on mr.role_id =r.id where account_id =#{accountId}
mapper.insert:
select id from `MEMBER` where id=(SELECT MAX(id) from `MEMBER`)
insert into `MEMBER`(account_id,password,name,phone,marketing,join_type,reg_date,update_date,login_date,status) VALUES(#{accountId},#{password},#{name},#{phone},#{marketing},#{joinType},now(),now(),now(),#{status})
